verbose_text: The role of arginase in alveolar macrophages in LPS induced acute lung injury remains controversial, since a recent study showed that mesen-chymal stem cell conditioned medium mediates the reso-lution of LPS induced acute lung injury, ameliorates lung inflammation and promoting a wound healing / anti-inflam-matory M2 macrophage cell, includes and arginase 1 activity increases, in an insulin growth factor 1 (IGF-1)-dependent form [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: induced acute lung injury, ameliorates lung inflammation and promoting a wound healing/anti-inflam-matory M2 macrophage cell, includes and arginase 1
